data.actual_result: Discord connects to the Voice Channel, but it takes you to the top, or sometimes a random, Text Channel.
data.expected_result: Discord connects to the Voice Channel and leaves you on the Channel where you sent the message.
data.short_description: By joining a Voice Channel from clicking on a message tag Discord will take you to the top (or a random) Text Channel.
data.steps_to_repro: - Click and hold on the Voice Channel to copy its ID (you need to have the Developer Mode enabled, to do that go to Settings > Behavior > Developer Mode). - Paste the ID in a Text Channel using this format: `<#idHere>` and then send it. - Click on the Channel tag and observe.
